operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_dialogs (user_id, peer_type, peer_id, top_message, unread_count, date2, created_at) VALUES (:user_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :top_message, :unread_count, :date2, :created_at)

operation.name: SelectPinnedDialogs
operation.sql: SELECT id, peer_type, peer_id, top_message, read_inbox_max_id, read_outbox_max_id, unread_count, unread_mentions_count, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound, pts, draft_id, date2 FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id AND is_pinned = 1 ORDER BY top_message DESC

operation.name: CheckExists
operation.sql: SELECT id FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id

operation.name: SelectByPeer
operation.sql: SELECT id, peer_type, peer_id, top_message, read_inbox_max_id, read_outbox_max_id, unread_count, unread_mentions_count, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound, pts, draft_id, date2 FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id

operation.name: SelectDialogsByUserID
operation.sql: SELECT id, peer_type, peer_id, top_message, read_inbox_max_id, read_outbox_max_id, unread_count, unread_mentions_count, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound, pts, draft_id, date2 FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id

operation.name: SelectByPinnedAndOffset
operation.sql: SELECT id, peer_type, peer_id, top_message, read_inbox_max_id, read_outbox_max_id, unread_count, unread_mentions_count, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound, pts, draft_id, date2 FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id = :user_id AND is_pinned = :is_pinned AND top_message < :top_message ORDER BY top_message DESC LIMIT :limit

operation.name: SelectDialogsByPinnedAndOffsetDate
operation.sql: SELECT id, peer_type, peer_id, top_message, read_inbox_max_id, read_outbox_max_id, unread_count, unread_mentions_count, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound, pts, draft_id, date2 FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id = :user_id AND is_pinned = :is_pinned AND date2 > :date2 ORDER BY date2 DESC LIMIT :limit

operation.name: SelectDialogsByPeerType
operation.sql: SELECT id, peer_type, peer_id, top_message, read_inbox_max_id, read_outbox_max_id, unread_count, unread_mentions_count, show_previews, silent, mute_until, sound, pts, draft_id, date2 FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type

operation.name: UpdateTopMessage
operation.sql: UPDATE user_dialogs SET top_message = :top_message, unread_count = :unread_count, unread_mentions_count = :unread_mentions_count, date2 = :date2 WHERE id = :id

operation.name: UpdateUnreadByPeer
operation.sql: UPDATE user_dialogs SET unread_count = 0, read_inbox_max_id = :read_inbox_max_id WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id

operation.name: UpdateReadOutboxMaxIdByPeer
operation.sql: UPDATE user_dialogs SET read_outbox_max_id = :read_outbox_max_id WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id
